name: Home Escape
summary: Surrounded by threats and paralyzed with fear – home is hell sometimes. There’s this kid who’s stuck in a really bad place. Can you help him escape the misery of an abusive home? Pick up your Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controller and pull him out of this mess – literally. Swing the controller to crush upcoming threats. Go at it alone or join forces with another player. There are 40 hellishly hard levels to get through. But surely it’s all worth it to save a child in trouble? What to expect in home escape?
